Text:
Just noticed I missed issue 15 in the torrent. For 15 see http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6560424/Haunt_Issue_15_

SkinnerSweet

Thanks a lot. But Issues 6 and 7 are ZIP archives, meaning they should end in ".cbZ" not ".cbR". The way they are now, you can't open them with CDisplay.
For all having that problem ("Access Violation"-Something in CDisplay), simply rename the files to end in ".cbZ", like "Haunt 06.cbZ" and "Haunt 07.cbZ".

Cheers
issue 12 is in.. spanish? or some other language ;)

@Uriz3n: I dont have any problems with the files but I am using gonvisor as my reader.

overall, very good job with completting the series, SkinnerSweet ;)
